sentences.english: You're going to be nice and balanced,
She has the dancer's finely proportioned physique.
sentences.chinese: 她有着舞蹈演員那種曼妙勻稱的體型。

sentences.english: The designs in the rug are well proportioned.
Women's figures gradually started to have a certain aestheticism and symmetrical stature.
sentences.chinese: 對女性開始有特定的審美要求和勻稱的身材。

sentences.english: It proportion of symmetry, oval-shaped eyes and big God.
sentences.chinese: 它比例勻稱，橢圓形的眼睛大而有神。

sentences.english: The jaws are strong with a full complement of evenly set and properly intermeshing teeth.
sentences.chinese: 結實而豐滿，牙齒位置勻稱且相互齧合的很好。

sentences.english: Make sure to flaunt your well-tones body and fabulous muscles.
sentences.chinese: 確定你張揚着自己勻稱的身體和驚人的肌肉。

sentences.english: Haut-Medoc Cru Bourgeois is often medium-full bodied, straightforward fruit and well balanced.
sentences.chinese: 好梅鐸高級酒通常是中高身型，果味直接及勻稱。

sentences.english: The even and harmonious proportion of the furniture shows the hidden quietness and dignity of the city.
sentences.chinese: 勻稱協調的比例，透散着都市的淡泊寧靜貴氣。

sentences.english: Long, shapely arms are considered more attractive than endless legs, the study has found.
sentences.chinese: 研究發現，修長勻稱的手臂被認爲比美腿更有吸引力。

sentences.english: The screen on this unit is well proportioned.
Gallia was a tall human female with a trim build.
sentences.chinese: 加利亞是一位身材高挑勻稱的人類女性。

sentences.english: Still, symmetry isn't everything, Meston and Buss said.
sentences.chinese: 然而，身體勻稱並不意味着一切，梅斯頓和布斯說到。

sentences.english: The house was white inside and well-proportioned.
sentences.chinese: 房子裏面是白色的，比例勻稱。

sentences.english: A slit skirt revealed shapely legs.
sentences.chinese: 開叉的裙子暴露出勻稱的腿。

sentences.english: Impeller is a disc, on the circumference of the blade evenly with.
sentences.chinese: 葉輪是1個圓盤，圓周上的葉片呈放射狀勻稱擺列。

definition: mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
